item.title: Configure libvirt with openvswitch bridge
item.description: Create OpenvSwitch bridge ovs-vsctl add-br br0 Configure libvirt with br0 just created BRNAME=br0 cat > /tmp/libvirt-net.xml <<EOF <network> <name>${BRNAME}</name> <forward mode='bridge'/> <bridge name='${BRNAME}'/> <virtualport type='openvswitch'/> </network> EOF virsh net-define /tmp/libvirt-net.xml virsh net-start $BRNAME virsh net-autostart $BRNAME

item.title: Nested KVM
item.description: Enable the setting for Nested KVM cat <<EOF > /etc/modprobe.d/kvm-nested.conf options kvm_intel nested=1 EOF modprobe -r kvm_intel modprobe kvm_intel cat /sys/module/kvm_intel/parameters/nested Edit the configuration of a virtual machine you’d want to set nested virsh edit {DOMAIN_NAME} and add the following setting to the vm configuration: <cpu mode='host-passthrough'> </cpu>
